title: Heartwarming: Watching This Father & Kid Rejoice Over A New Cycle Will Tug At Your Heartstrings
text:
Heartwarming: Watching This Father & Kid Rejoice Over A New Cycle Will Tug At Your Heartstrings

Heartwarming: Watching This Father & Kid Rejoice Over A New Cycle Will Tug At Your Heartstrings

Today’s materialistic world often urges us to buy the coolest gadgets, the trendiest clothes, and in this race for getting bigger and better we've all forgotten the simple joys of life.

This father and son celebrating the purchase of their humble cycle will put things into perspective for you.

Twitter

The video was posted by Twitter user @bharatshitole and the caption reads, "True happiness doesn't require mercedes always....If any information about this girl child and her father please let me know, we soldiers of #BharatVikasParishad will gift new cycle to this #BharatKiBeti and to her father too.

The father can be seen praying and putting a garland around his bicycle as his daughter jumps with joy.

We live in a world where no matter how many possessions we have, we’re never satisfied. That’s because they are only substitutes for what we pine for deep down, and that thing is happiness.

In our world, hundreds of millions of people go hungry to bed everyday, don't have clean water to drink, and a roof to live under and yet, we don't think of extending a helping hand to those in need.

Self-gratification is all that we look forward to. We hope the video above helps in pulling away from this vicious cycle of materialism and selfishness and to look for joy in simpler things.
